column2: MasterCard profit rises 3 pctUPDATE 2-MasterCard 2014 revenue to come in at low end of forecast Jan 31 MasterCard Inc posted a lower-than-expected quarterly profit and said its net revenue for the year would come in at the low end of its three-year forecast range as customers migrate to Visa Inc as part of a previously announced deal.  UPDATE 2-MasterCard 2014 revenue to come in at low end of forecast Jan 31 MasterCard Inc posted a lower-than-expected quarterly profit and said its net revenue for the year would come in at the low end of its three-year forecast range as customers migrate to Visa Inc as part of a previously announced deal.
